Fort Lauderdale Foreclosure, Estate Planning, Real Estate, & Business Lawyers.

The Herman Law Group is a civil law firm representing clients in Fort Lauderdale and the surrounding South Florida counties. We take pride in our successes and the opportunity to fight for the rights of clients year after year.

We measure success by the outcomes consistently achieved for our clients.

We have handled 250+ highly contested foreclosure trials. 1,500+ foreclosure defense cases.
